Revert.origin: [if the donee of a general power fails to exercise it…the appointive assets to the donor's estate "W. M. McGovern, Jr. et al. "]

1.definition: to come or go back (as to a former status or state) [if the donee of a general power fails to exercise it…the appointive assets to the donor's estate "W. M. McGovern, Jr."]

2.definition: to return to the grantor or his or her heirs as a reversion
